texts.description: Our proprietary AI model (gtt-oos-20B) instantly analyzes every incoming PQR: detects active fraud, identity theft, legal actions, high emotional distress, and VIP clients. Automatically prioritizes, assigns SLA, and provides full transparency with clear explanations. Real-time protection for your clients and your business reputation.

metrics.label: Critical cases detected & prioritized in under 30 min
Accurate L0–L4 classification in real time

facilities.title: Real-Time Sentiment & Risk Analysis
facilities.description: Instantly detects frustration, anger, anxiety and critical keywords

facilities.title: Automatic Fraud & Identity Theft Detection
facilities.description: Any active fraud case is automatically escalated to L0 (≤30 min)

facilities.title: Guaranteed VIP Priority
facilities.description: VIP clients never fall into low-priority queues

facilities.title: Smart SLA Assignment (L0 to L4)
facilities.description: Automatically sets the optimal response time based on risk score

facilities.title: Full Transparency & Explainability
facilities.description: Clients and agents see exactly why a case was prioritized

facilities.title: Active Reputation Protection
facilities.description: Cases involving media or press are automatically upgraded

texts.description: Our in-house model gtt-oos-20B was fine-tuned on thousands of real  PQRs. It understands cooperative language, identifies legal-financial risk patterns, and makes faster, fairer decisions than any human team — 24/7.

features.title: Immediate Response to Critical Cases
features.description: Active fraud, identity theft or legal actions → attention in 30 minutes or less

features.title: Intelligent Risk Score (0–100)
features.description: Combines topic, emotion, urgency, amount and VIP status for perfect prioritization

features.title: Premium Treatment for VIP Clients
features.description: Your best clients always feel valued and prioritized

features.title: 100% Traceability & Auditability
features.description: Every decision is explained and justified. Zero arbitrary handling
